mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, EX.* FROM ( SELECT ex_review_no, R.ex_no, R.user_no, ex_review_date, ex_review_content, ex_review_star, E.ex_title FROM ex_review R, exhibition E WHERE user_no = #{userNo} AND R.ex_no = E.ex_no ORDER BY ex_review_no DESC ) EX ) ExReview WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startNo} AND #{endNo}
